fix_layers: This option sets every object to its 1.9 Z layer and Z order to make layering as close to 1.9 as possible.
Note that exact parity is impossible because some objects (portals and speed changers) have hardcoded Z layers in 2.2.
fix_white: Objects in 1.9 can be made white by setting them to an unused color ID. 2.2 doesn't understand this and uses the default color.
This option manually sets these objects to the 2.1 white channel.
fix_wavy_blocks: 2.2 has a weird bug where specifically these wavy blocks don't render properly when their color is set to pure black.
This option sets HSV brightness to +0.02 on these objects to prevent this.
unfix_glow: 2.1 added glow sprites to a few objects that didn't have them in 1.9.
This option disables glow on these objects.
unfix_uncolored_3d: Two sets of 3D blocks had no color channel assigned to them in 1.9, and always displayed as uncolored. They were changed to the Obj channel in a later update.
This option makes them uncolored again.
